title: game isnt installing
body: the game never installs,i open it n the update begins but stops at random times n says "unexpected error occurred. please  check the logs for more information". iv tried installing it for about 20 times now pls help. I really hope riot can help me.

replies.body:
About how far along in the install are you getting percentage wise? The method of troubleshooting that error is different depending on when exactly it happened.

- 0-32% - This usually means that the client is being blocked by your OS. Double check that your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) are all setup correctly for League to install
- 33-99% - This almost always points towards some kind of connection troubles. Check out your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and look for anything that might need to be updated

thank you for your reply. it stops by 32% and sometimes 33% according to your reply about 32% is because of permissions issues. I am currently using Microsoft 10 can u please guide me step by step as to what to do. I would be very thankful if u could do that.

Not a problem! Make sure you go through the steps in this guide-> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions

If you have any problems along the way, hit me back up or reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) ^_^!

thank u for the help earlier! I was really exited when the bar crossed 33% but sadly all of it died when it stopped at 52% :/ T.T I really wanna play this amazing game but everytime something or the other happens n I cant play the game. pls help me out again....

Well snap =\ . Now that we've got those permissions straightened out, it looks like you're having some issues keeping a solid connection with our download servers. Getting stopped after 33% means that something interrupted your network's connection and it wasn't able to continue grabbing the game data. 

Run through your network settings using this guide -> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues and let me know if that helps!
